meanings.definition: The most perfect or typical example of a quality or class.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness is the quintessence of goodness.
meanings.sent2: The majestic lion is the quintessence of strength in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream reached the quintessence when he ate it for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with the quintessence of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children is the quintessence of joy.

meanings.definition: The purest or most concentrated essence of something.
meanings.sent1: The quintessence of the perfume was so strong that it lingered for hours.
meanings.sent2: The scientist extracted the quintessence of the plant for his research.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret sauce contained the quintessence of all flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her words were the quintessence of wisdom, guiding us through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The melody captured the quintessence of sadness, bringing tears to our eyes.
